mapper.select: select td.* from t_data td left JOIN t_scene_data_mapper sdm on td.data_code = sdm.data_code where scene_code = #{sceneCode}

select count(1) from (select count(*) from t_scene ts right JOIN t_scene_data_mapper sdm on ts.scene_code = sdm.scene_code left join t_data td on td.data_code = sdm.data_code where ts.scene_code like concat('%','scene00','%') group by ts.scene_code) t

select * from t_scene ts right JOIN t_scene_data_mapper sdm on ts.scene_code = sdm.scene_code left join t_data td on td.data_code = sdm.data_code where ts.scene_code like concat('%','scene00','%') and td.data_name like concat('%','3','%') group by ts.scene_code
